eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
 Q_{\rm L}(f)=\int_{C_{\rm left}} \frac{dw}{2\pi i}\,f(w)\,J_{\rm B}(w),
\ \ \ 
 C_{\rm L}(f)=\int_{C_{\rm left}} \frac{dw}{2\pi i}\,f(w)\,c(w).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 Q(f)=\oint \frac{dw}{2\pi i} f(w) J_{\rm B}(w),\ \ \ 
 C(f)=\oint \frac{dw}{2\pi i} f(w) c(w).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 \tilde{q}_0&=&\frac{1}{2}(c_0 b_0-b_0 c_0)
+\sum_{n=1}^\infty (c_{-n} b_n-b_{-n} c_n),\nonumber\\
 q_n &=& \sum_{m=-\infty}^\infty c_{n-m}b_m\ \ \ (n\neq 0).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 c(w)=\sum_{n=-\infty}^\infty c_n w^{-n+1},\ \ \ 
 b(w)=\sum_{n=-\infty}^\infty b_n w^{-n-2},
\

\begin{eqnarray}
  c'(w)=\sum_{n=-\infty}^\infty c_n w^{-n},\ \ \ 
 b'(w)=\sum_{n=-\infty}^\infty b_n w^{-n-1}.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 U'(a)^{-1} &=&
 e^{K(h_a)}\,U(a)^{-1}\exp\left(-\tilde{q}_0
\log\frac{1+Z(a)}{1-Z(a)}\right)
\nonumber\\
&=&
 e^{K(h_a)}\times \sum_{n=0}^\infty
\frac{1}{n!}(L_2-L_{-2})^n \theta^n \times
e^{-4 \tilde{q}_0\,\theta}
\ \ \ \left(
\theta=
\frac{1}{4}\log\frac{1+Z(a)}{1-Z(a)}
\right)
\nonumber\\
&=&
 e^{K(h_a)}\,e^{-4 \tilde{q}_0 \theta} \nonumber\\
&& + e^{K(h_a)}\times
\left\{Q_{\rm B},\,
\sum_{n=1}^\infty
\frac{1}{n!}(b_2-b_{-2})(L_2-L_{-2})^{n-1} \theta^n 
\right\}
\times
e^{-4 \tilde{q}_0 \theta}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{Eq:UPKP1}
 U'(a)^{-1}(\left| P \right>\otimes c_1 \left| 0 \right>) &=&
e^{2\theta}\left| P \right>\otimes e^{K(h_a)} c_1\left| 0 \right>\nonumber\\
&&
+e^{K(h_a)}Q_{\rm B}
\sum_{n=1}^\infty
\frac{1}{n!}(b_2-b_{-2})(L_2-L_{-2})^{n-1} \theta^n 
(e^{2\theta}\left| P \right>\otimes c_1\left| 0 \right>) \nonumber\\
&=&
e^{2\theta}
\left| P \right>\otimes e^{K(h_a)} c_1\left| 0 \right>
+Q_{\rm B}'(a)\left| \phi \right>,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 c'(w)=\sum_{n=-\infty}^\infty c_n w^{-n-1+\lambda},\ \ \ 
 b'(w)=\sum_{n=-\infty}^\infty b_n w^{-n-\lambda}.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 U_f e^{K(g)}\,c'(w)\,e^{-K(g)} U_f^{-1} &=&
 w^{\lambda-2}\,U_f e^{K(g)}\,c(w)\,e^{-K(g)} U_f^{-1} \nonumber\\
 &=&
 w^{\lambda-2}\,e^{g(w)}\,U_f \,c(w)\,U_f^{-1} \nonumber\\
&=&
 w^{\lambda-2}\,e^{g(w)}\,(\partial f(w))^{-1}
 \,c(f(w)) \nonumber\\
&=&
 w^{\lambda-2}\,e^{g(w)}\,(\partial f(w))^{-1}
 \,(f(w))^{2-\lambda} c'(f(w)).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 Q_{\rm L}(f)=\int_{C_{\rm left}} \frac{dw}{2\pi i}\,f(w)\,J_{\rm B}(w),
\ \ \ 
 C_{\rm L}(f)=\int_{C_{\rm left}} \frac{dw}{2\pi i}\,f(w)\,c(w).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 Q(f)=\oint \frac{dw}{2\pi i} f(w) J_{\rm B}(w),\ \ \ 
 C(f)=\oint \frac{dw}{2\pi i} f(w) c(w).
\
